name: HAPPY DOGS
description:
■Overview
Are there times you feel bored, but your dog is not there? We have a solution for that! “HAPPY DOGS” is a cute puzzle game that offers “companionship” throughout the day, just like our fluffy friends.

Rescue your adorable companion and embark on an adventure through 150 different stages and even more challenges waiting ahead.

■ How to play
Clear the stage by helping the little dog to get in the glass.
Cut ropes, slice obstacles and use other objects to overcome gradually more difficult challenges.
Aiming to be the best? Try to complete the stage with minimal slashes and claim your 3-star rating.

■ Hint
Getting stuck? Use an orb to get some hints!
Eager for more challenges? Don’t worry, new stages are already on the way!
Enjoy endless puzzling fun with the cutest fuzzball puppy ever!
